message.content:
1. The trial was conducted in drug shops in Tanzania.
2. 82 shops were selected for the trial.
3. 42 of the selected shops were randomized to receive text message reminders.
4. The text message reminders were about what advice to provide when dispensing artemether-lumefantrine (AL).
5. Artemether-lumefantrine (AL) was the drug involved in the trial.
6. The trial was a cluster randomized trial.

messages.content:
Statement: In this cluster randomized trial in drug shops in Tanzania, 42 of 82 selected shops were randomized to receive text message reminders about what advice to provide when dispensing artemether-lumefantrine (AL).

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
